General.Name: Euro Yatirim Holding AS
General.Description: Euro Yatirim Holding A.S. offers financial services in Turkey. It provides various financial services, including derivative instruments, stock and bond-bills trading; repo and reverse repo transactions; overdraft trading; public offering; and investment consultancy services. The company also provides portfolio management services to individuals and corporates. Euro Yatirim Holding A.S. was founded in 1996 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Cerrahogullari Business Center No:17, Istanbul, Turkey
